body: Wow, this got drama
Knew there'd be essays on this

look at all this beta cucks lol, getting triggered over nothing. if you dont like it dont read, find something that suit your taste. why bother harassing the author? its not like he'll change the story after hearing you all bitching and moaning lol.

huh :/ i kinda understand why the wife is obedient to the first man who raped her because he is blackmailing her. but the second man/ryouta??? why the fuck is she allowing him to fuck herself??? she didn’t even bother to put up a fight.

Katsura airi's drawing style is really superb to my preference, to bad his/her stories were all garbage.
I think the market for MC wiho can man up and put those netorare nigga to ICU is prospectively big since we rarely read it.
He/she should try it, unless those japs really prefer beta cuck MC tough.
LOL hell no niggers. kill all cucks
Hoping the husband drives the kid off, leaving the wife to go running back and be truly broken.

@SoulNoEffect, yeah that makes perfect sense but this author is trash tier so the husband catching them will amount to jack shit. I don't even think he will confront this guy or his wife yet and the 1st rapist will notice and use it to his advantage to break the wife and turn the husband into a willing cuck.

2nd rapist will expose 1st rapist. Regardless of outcome after being exposed.  His wife will have to admit this after witnessing that attacking/plus forceful hug.  2nd rapist wont go down alone you can see how much he HATES it all plus locking the door panels before to prevent a threesome again though he was the one caught.  He will expose the other 1st rapist blackmailer.

If it wasn't for the two old women; bringing it up.Then realizing how less and less she talks and how much longer it takes her to pick up the missed calls, and not returning the calls.  Changing his vacation without consulting his wife. Was his answer.

it will be better if it just only the 1st guy that ntr this girl

Hope Kazuhiko doesn't immediately interrupt just so either Miko or Ryouta bring up Takashi just to blow the whole thing open. Probably won't happen, tho.

She way to much of a push over to take serious, some how some way the asshole gonna get away with it. Im just invested to see what this dum women gonna choose, its ntr so it dont look good, she probably defend the asshole saying he made her feel like a women or some stupid shit
is that part of the plan? to make ryuta the only bad guy? I hope the worst come to him
